description:
HandBrake 1.8 open-source and free video transcoding application is now available for download with a GTK4 port for Linux users, as well as numerous other new features and enhancements.

The post HandBrake 1.8 Video Transcoder Adds GTK4 Port on Linux, FFmpeg 7.0 Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: HandBrake 1.8 Video Transcoder Adds GTK4 Port on Linux, FFmpeg 7.0 Support

description:
IceWM 3.5 lightweight window manager is now available for download with new features, options, commands, improvements, and bug fixes. Here’s what’s new!

The post IceWM 3.5 Lightweight Window Manager Released with New Features appeared first on Linux Today.
title: IceWM 3.5 Lightweight Window Manager Released with New Features

description:
Oracle phases out HashiCorp’s Terraform in favor of OpenTofu, aiming for more open infrastructure solutions.

The post Oracle Abandons Terraform in Favor of OpenTofu appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Oracle Abandons Terraform in Favor of OpenTofu

description:
Proposed almost a month ago, a new spin featuring the Miracle Window Manager has been approved by the Fedora Engineering Steering Committee (FESCo), who took a vote on it.

The post Fedora Approves a New Spin With Miracle Window Manager appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Fedora Approves a New Spin With Miracle Window Manager

description:
7-Zip 24.05 file archiver introduces speed optimizations for decompression, support for new archive types, and enhanced hash algorithm capabilities.

The post 7-Zip 24.05 Expands Archive Compatibility appeared first on Linux Today.
title: 7-Zip 24.05 Expands Archive Compatibility

description:
SUSE’s new installer, Agama, is taking shape. Now, with a faster startup, improved architecture, and a powerful new storage setup interface.

The post SUSE’s Agama Installer Shifts from Cockpit to HTTP appeared first on Linux Today.
title: SUSE’s Agama Installer Shifts from Cockpit to HTTP
